name: spaceants3D
description: spaceants3D is a post-ludo space of meditation and self reflection, just as it is a high octane adrenaline rush of a capital G game for the hardcore survival "Call of Duty" game player. spaceants3D is a 2D momentum based torque oriented collision centric roguelike experimental hypervisual/audio sensory immersion tank of a lean, focused, precise software product created entirely through computer code alone. If you don't play spaceants3D you will not be prepared when and (if) you finally meet "the one".
